The main problem 
I've 
> heard is slimes, so this is what I think should be done. Some thing 
like 
> "Due to the magical nature of the halfling, split can be dangerous." 
or 
> something like that. These are the numbers I think we should use in 
the 
> background(that the player won't know about of course)

1st, the biggest proposal is limit who can become halfings.  IMHO, you 
should only have halfings if both characters have reached a certain 
experience level (15 or higher).  In addition, how about proposing a 
cost associated to creating halfings: it costs money to create a 
halfings?  If we conviently ignore slimes from becoming potential 
halfings, everybody is happy.  Incidently, last time I checked the 
poll, it was a dead for calling halfings either 'dual class' or 
'hybrids'.
